br.com.caelum.vraptor.validator

Class DefaultValidator

  • java.lang.Object
    • br.com.caelum.vraptor.validator.AbstractValidator
      • br.com.caelum.vraptor.validator.DefaultValidator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Validator

    @RequestScoped
public class DefaultValidator
extends AbstractValidator
    The default validator implementation.
    Author:
    Guilherme Silveira
